articles.title: Noted Painter Lalitha Lajmi, Sister Of Filmmaker Guru Dutt, Dies - NDTV
articles.description: Artist Lalitha Lajmi, late actor-filmmaker Guru Dutt's sister, died on Monday at the age of 90. Taking to Twitter, the National Gallery of Modern Art (NGMA) shared the news of her demise.
